workflows.update_file_tree.yml: GitHub Actions workflow: updates file tree
workflows.update_structure.yml: GitHub Actions workflow: checks & updates repo structure
workflows.update_variables.yml: GitHub Actions workflow: updates environment variables

config.envConfig.js: Loads environment variables for the application

docs.AI_DEVELOPER_NOTES.md: Developer notes and context about AI functionalities

env.txt: CLI instructions or environment variable usage notes
file_tree.txt: Automatically generated representation of the file tree

scripts.autoUpdateDescriptions.js: Script to auto-update descriptions for new files
scripts.updateNetlifyVars.js: Script to update Netlify environment variables

utils.compareStructure.js: Compares desired structure with current and detects differences
utils.fileManager.js: File/directory management utilities (create, copy, move, etc.)
utils.fileTreeGenerator.js: Generates a textual representation of the file tree
utils.updateDescriptions.js: Recursively updates descriptions metadata with placeholders

structure.config.json: Self-referential file describing the repository structure
